Autonomous Surface Vehicles | Lafayette, LA | Fulltime Onsite

ASV Global is looking for exceptional software engineers seeking a career in autonomous systems.

We expect you to be the engineer that other people can count on and the one that people turn to when the going gets tough. You should attack every problem with enthusiasm and share the teamâ€™s passion for quality and customer satisfaction. In return you will get to work in an environment where no two days are the same and where your contribution makes a real difference. You will be integral to the successful growth and development of the company.
